Learn Martial Arts In The Comfort Of Your Own Home

At the Global Martial Arts University (GMAU), we believe that everyone should have access to the training they need to protect and better themselves. That's why we built a better, proven way to learn martial arts.

  • Your choice of style in the convenience of your home, across your devices
  • Gain real rank at your own pace with one on one feedback
  • All of it at the fraction of the cost of a traditional studio

Take advantage of this chance to protect yourself and the ones you love with our no commitment FREE beginners course!

Our Core Benifits

Train Whenever, Whereever

With the Global Martial Arts learning platform you can train wherever you want to, across your favorite devices, at a time that works best with your schedule.

Fraction of the Cost of a Tradition Studio

Traditional martial arts studios can cost hundreds of dollars a month, with GMAU you will have everything you need to learn your favorite martial art for as little as $39/month. Save thousands on your path to blackbelt!

Learn Martial Arts from Home

We custom tailor the learning process for you to be able to learn in the comfort of your own home. No more having to rush to get to a session or being one in a crowd. Your journey to mastery is yours and we focus on you by providing exclusive one on one feedback

Ready for a Stronger
and Safer you?

Any style of martial arts that you choose will help you feel more grounded and stable with your body. Learning Martial Arts is anextremely rewarding journey that we want to support you through. We even created a special offer so you could dip your toe into the practice of martial arts by taking a free beginners coursewhich will help you on your journey to one day becoming a master.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee with
Our Proven Process.

Step by step, we guide you from Grasshopper to Sensei.

Easy to use Portal and Progress Tracking

Watch detailed video courses on your computer or mobile device anywhere, anytime. Learning your favorite style with clear progress markers, full classes to follow along with, and tips/tricks that will make you a ninja in no time.

Get the Feedback you need to Progress

We are dedicated to helping you on your journey to health, powerful self-defense, and mastering your favorite style. Our world-class instructors take the time to provide you detailed feedback soyou can improve your skills and get the mentorship you want.

Earn Real Rank and Hit Clear Milestones

Our instructors are fully accredited and able to supply you real rank as you progress in your style of choice. Be able to track clear milestones to becoming a master, increasing your strength, and be apart of a community.

About Us

Take a moment to learn about the history of our university, and our proven unique way of learning martial arts in the convenience of your home.

Helping Our Students be their Best

The GMAU is on a constant quest to improve our courses, instruction, website, and experience for you. We only exist to help our students reach their goals.

The GMAU is the Golden Standard for At-Home Martial Arts Instruction.

We’ve been working with global distance training students since 2008. This has led us to creating cutting-edge home study courses that actually work.Our instructors, courses, and standards are held to the highest standards – so that you receive the highest quality training experience possible.

Rank Earned is Internationally Accredited and Recognized

The Global Martial Arts Association, member instructors, and affiliated schools back your rank and certification.

Rank is Earned, Not Given.

We uphold the same standards (if not higher) for our online home study students.

Rank is recognized by the Global Martial Arts Association, which is an internationally accredited organization of martial arts instructors.

Spread Abundance by Doing Martial Arts

We believe in serving and spreading abundance for the best and highest good of all.

The Abundance Projects

Each month, a significant portion of our proceeds go to The Abundance Projects. This is a positive-action initiative which we have undertaken for the best and highest good of everyone.

The primary goal is to motivate martial artists to become leaders in their community, and create “abundance projects” which are based in the mindset of prosperity, rather than lack or disparity.

What Our Students
are Saying

Christian Bindah (Student since 2012)

Shotokan Karate

The training material is good, the exams aren’t easy…you really need to earn a rank/belt. It is no fake MCdojo :). I can train where and whenever I have the time. I just took the yellow belt exam and received a 25 minute long personal video from Sensei Jon reviewing my material.

John Balouziyeh (Student since 2012)

Ultimate Bo

With Ultimate Bo, I can train whenever I find it convenient early mornings,after the children are put asleep—anytime. It also saves me travel time to the dojo in city traffic, which means I can invest more time in training. I find Ultimate Bo’s methodology clear and easy to follow, and it is more than just learning self-defense; the techniques, when put together into a full kata form, create a graceful form of art, not to mention a rigorous workout, particularly when performed in rapid succession.

Contact Us

Need to contact us? expect a speedy and knowledgeable response time within a few hours Monday through friday (9-5 pm central). One of our head will reply to you directly. on the weekends expect a response in 24-48 hours. want to chat with us? leave your phone number in a message right corner with a good time to call back.
